attributes.action:
Stop all Councils in the UK giving out commercial dog breeding licen
ses
attributes.background:
Lucys Law does not go far enough in the welfare of dog breeding and selling.  If you stopped the UK councils giving out commercial licenses then this would eliminate most the problems.
UK is a dog loving nation now lets prove it

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may be interested to know that the Government is currently consulting on a ban on third party puppy and kitten sales in England. You can find out more here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-backs-ban-on-third-party-sales-of-puppies-and-kittens
